name: Cyriac Aiswarya
content: Aiswarya / Aiswarya Cyriac Home Research Teaching C. Aiswarya Associate Professor Theoretical Computer Science Group Chennai Mathematical Institute Member, ReLaX (an international research lab of CNRS, France) Research Interests: I am interested in automata theory, and its applications in the verification of infinite state systems. I am also interested in formal mathematical models of concurrent and infinite state systems. Upcoming Events PODS 2026: I serve on the PC. FSTTCS 2025: I serve on the PC (co-chair).
